title: Grimm Douwa: Watanabe Yaoyoi Sakuhinshuu 2
original_name: グリム童話 渡辺やよい 作品集 2
sinopse:
1. Hinkaku Shukusei! Chie no Aru Musume: Onna no Misao Ubawarete
2. Maria-sama no Netsu Shisen: Tobira-Oku no Kairaku S-kyuu Danshi
3. Kamisama no Meshiagari Mono: Otto to Imouto no Kankei - Ane no Fukushuu (Those Served God: Relationship of Husband and Sister - Sister of Revenge)
4. Koibito Roland no Netsu Houyou: Anata Konomi no Onna ni Shite
